entry.dcterms:description: 1. Public judgement of the current political situation 2. Public opinion about the perception of inflation 3. Mapping the public opinion about thre work and reputation of the Hungarian competition authority 4. Habits of telephone use 5. Opinions about the guarantee insurance of cars

survey data
cross-section
Multi-stage proportionately stratified national probability sample representative of the adult Hungarian population. Respondents were selected using the Leslie Kish key and the random walking method.
face-to-face interview
1. block (7-24. quest.): A, 2. block (25-34. quest.): D, 3. block (35-50. quest.): D, 4. block (55-57. quest.): D, 5. block (410. quest): D
